info.description: API to retrieve the arrangement details
info.title: Arrangement Details

get.summary: Retrieves the arrangement details for specific customer

parameters.name: arrangementStatus
parameters.description: Indicates the status of the Arrangement during the life cycle of the contract

parameters.name: productLineId
parameters.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

parameters.name: productGroupId
parameters.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

linkedAppl.description: Denotes the T24 application linked to the Arrangement contrac

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.
